title: How to Get Through the Final Pursuit Area in Need for Speed: Most Wanted

steps.headline: Get a trainer for this to work.
If you have the trainer with a button that lets you pass through yellow barriers and the button is f8 then good!
Go to the pursuit area.
steps.description: You will see that it's block by some pile of sand and a machine.

steps.headline: Keep pressing f8 until you're through the sand barriers.

text: Get a trainer for this to work.  If you have the trainer with a button that lets you pass through yellow barriers and the button is f8 then good! ! Go to the pursuit area. You will see that it's block by some pile of sand and a machine. Keep pressing f8 until you're through the sand barriers.
